job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Location  NYC onsite brDuration  6 MonthbrInterview Process  1 Internal and 2 Client Interviewbr br brbrPrincipal Site Reliability Engineer Productivity  Conferencing Services Workplace Technology Engineeringbr brThe Principal Site Reliability Engineer for Productivity Services is responsible for the technical design and operations of productivity solutions used globally by client employees and partners These solutions will enable the workforce to create share and collaborate on content from anywhere at anytime built upon the Microsoft 365 and Azure platforms This technical leadership role is expected to apply a software engineering mindset to system administration topics elevating the availability reliability and security of solutions while reducing operational costsbrSpecific solutions includebrEmail and calendaring Exchange Outlook ProofpointbrFile storage and sharing OneDrive DropboxbrDocument creation Word Excel PowerPointbrVideo audio and text chat Teams SlackbrMeeting room conferencing and booking Cisco CondecobrSpecific responsibilities includebrLead the technical design implementation and operation of productivity solutions with an emphasis on security systems architecture and automated provisioningbrContribute to the site reliability engineering center of excellence including the creation of standard artifacts best practices and learning plansbrParticipate as a standing member of the engineering review board to evaluate trade studies approve solution designs and maintain the overall workplace system architecturebrParticipate in the weekly agile process to resolve technical impediments and assist in user story definition and sizingbrDesired characteristics includebrAbility to communicate effectively both written and verbally to stakeholders and engineersbrAbility to build effective crossfunctional relationships in support of delivering enterprisewide solutionsbrAbility to execute within a fastpaced agile process Qualifications includebr5 years experience designing implementing and operating Microsoft 365 services at enterprise scalebr5 years experience programming including shell scripting PowerShellbr5 years experience designing scalable and reliable enterprise solutions including considerations for multitier software architectures networking and securitybr3 years experience with cloudbased infrastructure and platform services Azure AWSbr2 years experience automating the deployment of enterprise solutions using infrastructureascode configuration management and CICD technologies Office 365 and Exchange certifications preferredbrExperience with data loss prevention archiving eDiscovery and compliance preferredbrMasters degree in computerrelated field preferred
